title: John306
author: John306
content: Hi everyone i am sharing the best upcoming project for the Traders where you can do spot trading , future trading with 125x leverage the name is 0xfutures.trade isn't it amazing.No other project offers this much leverage and there is not restrictions for leverage also traders can do spot trading with limit orders.and best part is everything will be automatically confused? They have a telegram bot where you have to provide the parameters for spot trading and future trading else their bot take care for your trading and i am sure easily maximize my profits. I am a full time traders and looking for this tool now I finally found one what's your opinion?Website link are below: https://0xfutures.trade/

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: No, it's not amazing. Big leverages are designed to make people lose their money faster, not to make money from them. If you present something that helps people lose money quickly as something amazing, then your project should be treated with caution. What matters to a good trader is the asset mix, trading volumes and variety of trading pairs, not the size of leverage.

comments.author: Oneandpure
comments.body: Big leverages try to make their user easily and faster got loss with trading future, its not interested offer with future trading model adopt 125x leverage although has bigger chance with faster to earn profit. If this site of future trading ability manage with small leverage under 125x is not bad ideas but I have been quit for long term with future trading. By the way with this future trading side, have an excited offer exactly with fees transaction, usually in Binance with new coins listed on future trading have bigger fees but if still huge above Binance on future trading fees I don't think any interested have to try with this platform exchange for future trading.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I usually laugh when people introduce such bots/tools that don't work. The aim it to milk the gullible users through joining premium clubs or VIP club through making subscription. If such tools really worked. There is no way someone would expose them to the public, let a lone sell them

We don't even know if that was site was safe or what.Instead of sharing that tool it's better to read some good advices on how to deal with Future trading.It's risky going against the leverage. You don't want to just rely everything on a tool.

comments.body: Quote from: John306 on October 06, 2023, 10:36:20 AMHi everyone i am sharing the best upcoming project for the Traders where you can do spot trading , future trading with 125x leverage the name is 0xfutures.trade isn't it amazing.No other project offers this much leverage and there is not restrictions for leverage also traders can do spot trading with limit orders.and best part is everything will be automatically confused? I am a full time traders and looking for this tool now I finally found one what's your opinion?Website link are below: https://0xfutures.trade/What will be the reason why traders would have to trust the site? Because I will tell you that people never just only look for the possible earning and offering high leverage but they/we are looking for a platform that can be fully trusted. Many get fooled by such offerings, now it is an old tactic that most traders already know and are aware of what will happen next. If you and the site will lower the leverage amount, maybe that will gain attention and confidence but with that 125x, that could be the reason why they will stay away.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: John306 on October 06, 2023, 10:36:20 AMI am a full time traders and looking for this tool now I finally found one what's your opinion?Website link are below: https://0xfutures.trade/Since you are using it can you share the accuracy of the tool? Like how much percentage it could give you profit inspite of the risk it has. Imagine a 125x is so huge leverage and I am thinking the liquidation is quite close to every entry and market price exit. Its like a real gamble if theres a steategy that could maximize potential to that figures.

comments.author: killerfrost
comments.body: I don't often trade leverage or futures, but if I want to do it, it would be safer to choose places with top stable volume on some CEX with a new product like the OP suggested.Â  Although I didn't do all the research, I did catch some familiar keywords on the site, which seemed like some trending intensity from the project. This stage is better than accumulating, don't expect too much from quick ways to make a profit with trading, especially this field requires many different skills and experiences to be successful.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Let's adhere to what you say that there's no other tool that offers 125x leverage. Exchanges themselves have their own times of leverage so with that, there's really no need to leverage with that much.Are you a pro trader? Well, you probably also know that it's a risky multiplier when you do leverage but anyway, that's what leverage is all about.But going with leverage trading, you don't really need a bot or software to do that in exchanges.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Quote from: TradeCoinD2 on October 07, 2023, 10:56:15 AMA significant leverage is also a double-edged sword, and trading bots are likewise a double-edged tool. If you're an experienced trader, you surely can't overly rely on these two factors. Moreover, these two factors are no longer novel enough to set apart the trading platform you're referring toYea, it's a formula for a disaster, specially if you are a newbie in spot/future trading. And we have heard horror stories as well to the point that the young trader has to take his live because he lost all the money in trading.So just be careful with this kind of tools, if you don't know anything about trading, I will advise everyone to stay away from it.But if by chance, you have experience already, then maybe you can try what the OP is promoting. But nevertheless, it's not an assurance that you will make a lot of money using this so called "best tool". Everything is still on the hands of the trader.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 06, 2023, 11:46:36 PMI usually laugh when people introduce such bots/tools that don't work. The aim it to milk the gullible users through joining premium clubs or VIP club through making subscription. If such tools really worked. There is no way someone would expose them to the public, let a lone sell themThis is all designed for beginners and naive users who are eager to get rich quick. As long as there is demand, there will be supply. Serious traders and people with experience will never use such services, because no one will ever earn anything with the help of these services. You can, at best, dabble and use this service as a toy, making a deposit of a few dollars and creating the illusion of trading/gambling. After these few dollars run out, you can immediately exit this service and never think about it again

comments.author: Huppercase
comments.body: Quote from: John306 on October 06, 2023, 10:36:20 AMHi everyone i am sharing the best upcoming project for the Traders where you can do spot trading , future trading with 125x leverage the name is 0xfutures.trade isn't it amazing.No other project offers this much leverage and there is not restrictions for leverage also traders can do spot trading with limit orders.and best part is everything will be automatically confused? I am a full time traders and looking for this tool now I finally found one what's your opinion?Website link are below: https://0xfutures.trade/Too good to be true. If your service is that amazing, you should have just keep it as trade secrets and not bring it for the public to use but I know you are lying my friend, there is nothing amazing about 125X unless your are nothing but a gambler. You mean to tell me I can use your tool to make 125X just like that, show me your prototype history of trades and then the withdrawal and I will believe after that, I know you have nothing in it.Secondly, why not register a dot com domain officially since this is a company. Unless you are in beta phase, there is no need to be using a dot trade domain for your website, at first glance people might think you are just another scammer which from your write indicated already, Discord would have been better option to convince people, telegram houses lots of scammed activityMy review on the website, remove that video on mobile phone view, it disturb the first page or make it hyperlink wrapped with YouTube html, make sure change that color, yellow looks odd.

comments.author: bitgolden
comments.body: Quote from: John306 on October 06, 2023, 10:36:20 AMHi everyone i am sharing the best upcoming project for the Traders where you can do spot trading , future trading with 125x leverage the name is 0xfutures.trade isn't it amazing.No other project offers this much leverage and there is not restrictions for leverage also traders can do spot trading with limit orders.and best part is everything will be automatically confused? They have a telegram bot where you have to provide the parameters for spot trading and future trading else their bot take care for your trading and i am sure easily maximize my profits. I am a full time traders and looking for this tool now I finally found one what's your opinion?Website link are below: https://0xfutures.trade/Not good enough marketing. If your company needs to be shared here in this manner to get customers then I am sorry but you are not going to get all that much attention. I think it's clear that you need something bigger and you need to keep on improving. I believe that it is going to be hard to handle it for the long term, but it is also quite possible that you could do better marketing for free as well.Just to give an example, if you are incapable of making an infographic, then you are not going to end up with anything good in return, the result will not be all that good and you should be guessing what else you could do about it, I get that it may not be all that great, and I get that it is not going to be all that important for you to know that to build this software, but you should definitely know it if you want to continue marketing, that is the best way to do it and if you lack that then the results of your marketing will not be all that good.

comments.author: Joseph-P
comments.body: Quote from: John306 on October 06, 2023, 10:36:20 AMHi everyone i am sharing the best upcoming project for the Traders where you can do spot trading , future trading with 125x leverage the name is 0xfutures.trade isn't it amazing.No other project offers this much leverage and there is not restrictions for leverage also traders can do spot trading with limit orders.and best part is everything will be automatically confused? They have a telegram bot where you have to provide the parameters for spot trading and future trading else their bot take care for your trading and i am sure easily maximize my profits. I am a full time traders and looking for this tool now I finally found one what's your opinion?Website link are below: https://0xfutures.trade/Notably high leverages like that make me more wary than amazed tbh. For my trading in general, I do on Bitget simply because they afford security and a couple other decent perks to come along. While I surely will love to have another alternative, I'm not sure a platform that offers 125x leverage is something I would look out for while checking. General features, user interface, security etc, are better metrics to judge an outstanding or average platform.
